page.title: 16BURTON SALMON FOOD 1
page.content: The survey of the eating patterns of the children of Burton Salmon provided the following information. The survey was completed during a summer month and this is reflected in the type of food consumed. For the younger school children,aged less than 8 years,the favourite food was fish and chips. Salad and chicken was almost as popular. Older children voted salad as the favourite food with fish and chips the second most popular. Beans on toast was also highly rated by both groups of children. For breakfast on most days younger children had cereal and milk with a fruit flavoured drink. On the few days when a cooked breakfast was eaten it was usually toast or egg. Older children followed a similar pattern.
